article_title: Bella Wilcox, Author at Peninsula Press
article_text: Bella is currently an undergraduate student at Stanford. She is a staff writer on the theater beat for The Stanford Daily. A Bay Area native, Bella has performed as an actor with theaters across the Peninsula including Theatreworks, American Musical Theatre of San Jose and Broadway by the Bay. Currently, she is involved with theatre and film productions at Stanford, and she is excited to study abroad in Australia this fall.
